channel.title: [FOUND] Actionbuttons for quests?
channel.description:
Edit: Made it print the case out to the runserver window on click, I can see them all now ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 317 Delta.
I want to config the action buttons so when I click on them, quest menus open.
I am capable of writing the code, But i don't know which case #'s to use.
anyone have a list or can tell me how to find them? I need to use all the lines in the quest menu
